name: Bonsai (itch) (Jacob Ryan, Simon Riber)
description:
Link to Questionnaire Current features/content

In this playtest, you will be able to :

  • Interact/pick up objects by pressing F
  • Water the plants after having picked up the watering can
    • Look at a plant/bonsai and hit F
  • Sit down at the benches (one at the entrance and one in the middle of the garden. both of them are boxes/rectangles)
  • Previous our amazing placeholder text appearing above plants
  • See the atmosphere and listen to the music in our grey box (with color) level
Know issues:
  • Standing back up has the watering can model appear yearly
  • Text is placeholder
  • You can go out of the map and fall forever into the void 
  • Text can stack if watering the same plant over and over again
  • There is no cool down in between interactions
  • A lot of player feedback is not there
  • The first plant that you water does not show text on purpose
